title: Red mullet with tomato, anchovy and porcini sauce
description: A quick, tasty meal of fried red mullet in a rich tomato sauce, full of bold fish flavours.
ingredients: 8 small whole red mullet, about 150g/5½oz each, gutted and scaled
salt and freshly ground black pepper
30g/1oz dried porcini (ceps), soaked for 30 minutes in warm water then drained and chopped
